name: Cell-Cell Interaction Database (CCIDB)
description: A curated database containing information about cell-cell interactions, including biological and clinical contexts. CCIs were manually retrieved from 272 studies and annotated with 38 types of context features.
full_citation: Noh JY, Lee HI, Choi JH, Cho SH, Yi YH, Lim JH, Myung EB, Shin YJ, Shin HJ, Woo HG. CCIDB: a manually curated cell-cell interaction database with cell context information. Database (Oxford). 2023 Aug 11;2023:baad057. doi: 10.1093/database/baad057. PMID: 37566630; PMCID: PMC10419333.
